price: መላእክትም ያሉትን (አስታውስ)፡፡ «መርየም ሆይ! አላህ በእርግጥ መረጠሸ፡፡ አነጻሽም፡፡ በዓለማት ሴቶችም ላይ መረጠሽ፡፡»
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَتِ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ وَطَهَّرَكِ وَٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ عَلَىٰ نِسَآءِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qālati al-malāikatu yāmaryamu inna al-laha iṣ'ṭafāki waṭahharaki wa-iṣ'ṭafāki ʿalā nisāi al-ʿālamīna
